subtitle: You wake up, you go about your day.
You put on your favorite pair of shoes, walk on the same street you do every day to get to work.
You come back home all beaten up, then sleep and repeat. You do this every day till the day you die.
Do you ever wonder what it all means?
I hope so, otherwise you're as good as dead, frankly. Do you really think that that's all there is?
Just a short meaningless life with nothing to look forward to after you die, well...
Let me tell you you're in for a shock, and when you come to the realization that there are
planes of existence beyond physical matter, you won't need a motivation to look within
because you'll understand that you need to get your arse in gear for your own spiritual sake.
Your purpose, is to wake up; out of the dream of your life
... to wake up out of the incessant thoughts and feelings that are keeping you from being awake
from moment to moment and living a full and present life. One path to realize this is through
Astral projection; an experience where you realize that the bag of blood and bones you carry around
all day is a minuscule temporary living suit in comparison to the infinite capability of your
soul; which can travel to any time and any place in existence. "How can I experience it?" you ask, well you
don't need to wait until you drop dead and someone throws your ashes to the ground that's for sure
this reality is right before your eyes in this very moment. Astral projection will only ever
happen now, not in the future, not next week, the practice is now. "Oh but I have a lot of work to do,
I'm so stressed out, I have to deal with this and that"... so what? Is that really an excuse
not to be aware and conscious in this moment? It doesn't matter what you're doing, it doesn't matter
if you don't think you live a spiritual life, the human experience is a spiritual experience!
When you Astral project, you'll realize in your direct experience, not through imagination,
not through visualization, not through fantasy, not through dreaming, but by actually being there
just as you are in the physical; and you'll look at your Astral body and realize your potential.
You'll see what there is to see, you'll feel what there is to feel. You can converse with spiritual
masters who have mastered this art long before you were ever born. You can talk to loved ones who
have passed away. You can understand the universe in the most intimate and sublime ways. You just
need to open your heart to the experience. Do you realize what implications this has for you?
Are you really ready for such a state of realization? Think about it all you want...
But when you're ready for the experience just remember; Astral projection is not something you think about.
Thinking is becoming old-fashioned. It's the demented parts of our mind; thinking, analyzing
skepticism, haven't we done enough of that already? Haven't we done enough damage through that?
Has it not brought about so much of the insanity we see in the world today? Break free from that.
Get out of your head. I don't really need to tell you how to break free beyond your body, beyond your mind...
because you know how to do it; deep within you you already have the ability, you just need to
let go. Stop feeling fear. Stop speculating. Stop questioning. Stop thinking you're not good enough.
Just stop. Who cares if you don't feel you're good enough? If you have personal issues then good
... that's where you start. Meditate. Concentrate. Contemplate. Read. Pray. Align yourself.
Stop thinking about tomorrow. Stop worrying about yesterday. Put down your phone. Turn off
your computer. Stop arguing with your family. Stop being angry with the world; science,
politics, stock markets - haven't you had enough of the world already? Isn't that why you're here
listening to this? It's time to block all that out and look within yourself. Sit down with yourself,
recognize your perception of the world and then go beyond it. When's the last time you really looked
at yourself? Be honest and ask yourself what games you're playing in your mind that's stopping you
from accessing spiritual realization now. When's the last time you really asked yourself whether
you're in a dream or not? Do you just believe everything you see without questioning it?
are you going through life in a dream-like state? It's time to wake up. Life only happens now...
and it's now which is the only time the Astral plane is accessible. Astral projection is achievable
every, single, night. Realize that your existence is absolutely fundamental, and filled with purpose.
You matter... and your spiritual awakening matters not just for you but for others.
Free. Your. Mind.
